entry.title: meeples (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that meeples (examples pictured) are considered an icon of modern-style eurogames?

entry.title: Kantibhai Patel (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Kantibhai Patel is a National Hero of Zimbabwe?

entry.title: Al-Rantisi Hospital (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Al-Rantisi Hospital can make water from air?

entry.title: Molly Burman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Molly Burman resumed releasing music three years later after finding that "Happy Things" had accrued a million streams on Spotify?

entry.title: minted coins (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that it is debated whether or not Nephites used minted coins?

entry.title: Caroline Andrew (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a year after becoming the first woman president of the Canadian Political Science Association, Caroline Andrew moderated the first Canadian leaders' debate on women's issues?

entry.title: War Against Smallpox (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that War Against Smallpox describes how Edward Jenner's vaccination technique spread across Europe during the Napoleonic Wars?

entry.title: DOM clobbering (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that DOM clobbering attacks can take over your website?
